bookTitle: Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance: An Inquiry Into Values
Plot: Robert M. Pirsig's Zen & the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance is an examination of how we live, a meditation on how to live better set around the narration of a summer motorcycle trip across America's Northwest, undertaken by a father & his young son.
Characters: Phaedrus, Sylvia Sutherland, John Sutherland, Chris
